entry.title: Curiosity Cabinet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mentze Ottenstein
Type: Cabinet
Price: 2345.00 - 2415.00 (2 variants)

A beautiful and modern rendition of a timeless furniture piece, the Curiosity Cabinet is carefully crafted in solid oak using traditional joinery techniques. Designed to store objects almost out of sight thanks to its elegant reeded glass doors that gently blur the contents within, it opens to reveal two height adjustable oak veneer shelves for ample room to store your objects. Brass hinges and handles complete the design. Available in low and high versions.

entry.title: Frame, 42
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type:
Price: 295.00 - 445.00 (14 variants)

Frame 42 is a flexible storage solution consisting of a square module in a cubistic frame. The simple storage system is inspired by the Kubus candleholder by Mogens Lassen, based on strict mathematical formulas and designed with the greatest precision. This variant is a classic Frame 42 module without doors and shelves.

s:variant.title: Open Module / Frame - Black Stained Ash
With Door / Frame - Black Stained Ash

entry.title: Suspension Bracket, Frame
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Sparepart
Price: 30.00 - 45.00 (3 variants)

The Suspension brackets in 3 different lengths is perfect if you should hang more than one Frame to ensure an easy and both vertical hang up.

entry.title: Frame Shelf
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Shelving Unit
Price: 65.00 - 90.00 (21 variants)

The Frame shelf lets you further enhance your storage solution while keeping clutter at bay. The simple storage system is inspired by Mogens Lassen’s iconic Kubus candle holder and based on a strict mathematical formula. Crafted with the greatest precision, the Frame modules are available in four sizes and can be hung on a wall or set on a floor. Combine Frame modules to create a bookcase, nightstand, room divider or something else entirely – the possibilities are endless. Frame modules are available with or without doors, shelves and drawers, allowing you to create the perfect storage solution to match your needs.

entry.title: Frame View
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Shelving Unit
Price: 1080.00 - 1335.00 (7 variants)

Frame View is a flexible storage solution consisting of a square module in a cubistic frame. The simple storage system is inspired by the Kubus candleholder by Mogens Lassen, based on strict mathematical formulas and designed with the greatest precision. Frame View can be used in countless contexts. Combine the Frame modules to create a classic bookcase, a room divider or something else entirely. The possible combinations are endless. Frame View consists of three Frame 42 modules with doors.

Price: 875.00 - 1060.00 (14 variants)

Crafted with the greatest precision, the Frame modules are available in a range sizes and configurations and can be hung on a wall or set on a floor. Frame is a flexible storage solution consisting of three modules – with a shelf, drawer and three drawers respectively – mounted in a cubist frame. Crafted with the greatest precision, the Frame modules are available in four sizes and can be hung on a wall or set on a floor. Combine Frame modules to create a bookcase, room divider or something else entirely – the possibilities are endless. Frame modules are available with or without doors, shelves and drawers, allowing you to create the perfect storage solution to match your needs.

Frame 35 Sideboard is a flexible storage solution consisting of a square module in a cubist frame. The drawers feature a soft-close system and hidden tracks. The simple storage system is inspired by Mogens Lassen’s iconic Kubus candle holder and based on a strict mathematical formula. Crafted with the greatest precision, the Frame modules are available in four sizes and can be hung on a wall or set on a floor. Combine Frame modules to create a bookcase, room divider or something else entirely – the possibilities are endless. entry.title: Frame Shoe Cabinet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Shelving Unit
Price: 740.00 - 845.00 (5 variants)

With its characteristic frame, Frame Shoe Cabinet is based on the same design as the existing Frame modules, but with new dimensions that makes it even more useful for storing your shoes. The inside is made in metal to ensure that dirt and wet shoes do not damage the cabinet. Placed on the wall, Frame Shoe Cabinet takes up no floor space, which makes it an ideal storage solution for small hallways.

Frame Shoe Cabinet is inspired by the Kubus candleholder by Mogens Lassen, based on strict mathematical formulas and designed with the greatest
precision.

entry.title: Frame, 70
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Shelving Unit
Price: 400.00 - 725.00 (21 variants)

The versatile and sleek Frame 70 allows you to create entirely new combinations and a new geometric expression for existing or new Frame arrangements. The new Frame 70 is designed based on the same cubist thinking as the rest of the collection, but it is now taller and slimmer. This makes it possible to use it in narrow places or tight spaces. Frame 70 can also be used to a supplement, so the personal Frame arrangement gets a new and updated look.

The Frame 70 module can be hung directly on the wall or stand on their own on the floor on the cubistic base “Base for Frame 35”, that both fits the Frame 70 and the Frame 35 modules. Combine the Frame modules to a classic bookcase, a room divider, or something else. The Frame modules are available with or without doors, shelves, or drawers, so you can find the storage solution that matches your need for organisation and storage. This variant contains a Frame 70 with a door and two shelves.

entry.title: Frame Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Shelving Unit
Price: 95.00 - 140.00 (18 variants)

Made to support the Frame modules, Base is a cubist design in black powder coated metal and inspired by Mogens Lassen’s iconic Kubus candle holder. Based on a strict mathematical formula and crafted with the greatest precision, the simple design fits selected Frame modules from the Frame collection. Simply place the desired components on the base to create a bookcase, nightstand or something else entirely. Add doors and shelves accordingly – the possibilities are endless.

entry.title: Frame Base
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Shelving Unit
Price: 160.00 - 310.00 (6 variants)

The Base for Frame is a cubistic frame in black metal that is inspired by the Kubus candleholder by Mogens Lassen, based on strict mathematical formulas and designed with the greatest precision. The simple and cubistic base is available in two sizes: 35 and 42 as an addition to the Frame modules from the Frame collection. With the simple base, you can create a dresser, a bookcase, a nightstand or something else entirely. Simply place the desired number of Frame modules on the cubistic Frame base.

The various Frame modules come in different sizes and colours. Depending on your exact storage needs, it is also possible to buy doors and shelves. The possible combinations are endless. It is a collection that truly unites functionality, quality and aesthetics.

entry.title: Zet Storage System, Magazine Shelf
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kaschkasch Cologne
Type: Shelving Unit
Price: 135.00

Put your objects in the spotlight with Zet, a modular shelving system that delivers on freedom and function. Easily assembled or disassembled and relocated whenever you want, its delicate balance of order, convenience and style is shaped from materials selected for beauty and endurance. Based on just two components - wooden U-shaped shelves and a metal frame construction defined by diagonal Z-struts – it comes in six colours and with optional display shelves and back panels.

entry.title: Zet Storage System
entry.summary:

Price: 925.00 - 1635.00 (12 variants)

Put your objects in the spotlight with Zet, a modular shelving system that delivers on freedom and function. Based on just two components - wooden U-shaped shelves and a metal frame construction defined by diagonal Z-struts – it comes in six colours and with optional display shelves and back panels.

Each shelf can carry 39 kg.
